tweet: Bank approved coins: BTC, ETH, XRP, ZEC (transparently)  Bank disapproved coins: BCH, EOS, DASH, XMR  One set will get custodians, ETPs, and strong surveillance first.  One set will have to work harder for public recognition.  ...the battle rages on internally and externally.
Dear exchanges, merchants, and services, please run set refresh-type no-coinbase in monero-wallet-cli for the time being. A patch will be out soon.
XMR wallets have been disabled for maintenance. We will provide an update here when the wallets have been reopened.
Friendly reminder that Monero has been in accumulation for 11 straight weeks now.
XMR wallets have been re-enabled. Thank you for your patience.
Market Outlook #25 is now live:  https://t.co/XfLW6cCYvF  I cover the past week's price-action in $BTC, $ETH and $XMR, as well as outline an opportunity in $LBC.   Enjoy the read, and please share!
